terms.label: RPC Art. 248 (Murder)
terms.description: Punishes murder under the Revised Penal Code (Philippines).

terms.label: Rule of Law
terms.description: Principle that all persons and institutions are subject to and accountable to law.

terms.label: Due Process
terms.description: No person shall be deprived of life, liberty or property without due process of law.

terms.label: Presumption of Innocence
terms.description: The accused shall be presumed innocent until the contrary is proved.

terms.label: Rule 133 — Proof Beyond Reasonable Doubt
terms.description: Defines the quantum of proof required for conviction in criminal cases.

terms.label: Rule 130 — Rules on Evidence
terms.description: Governs admissibility and weight of testimonial and documentary evidence.

terms.label: Rule 112 — Preliminary Investigation
terms.description: Outlines procedures for preliminary investigation of criminal complaints.

terms.label: Rule 110 — Prosecution by Information
terms.description: Covers the filing and contents of criminal informations.

terms.label: CPRA (2023) — Impartiality and Ethics
terms.description: Canon of Professional Responsibility and Accountability provisions on lawyer ethics and impartiality.

terms.label: Public Accountability
terms.description: Public officers must at all times be accountable to the people.
